hymn.title: Grant us the vision clear to see

layout.singingstanza: Grant us the vi -- sion clear to see We need a new hu -- man -- i -- ty; From all our na -- ture, we must be free; Eat -- ing of Je -- sus is the key! Breath -- ing this man with -- in the Word, Call -- ing with them who call "O Lord"; Eat -- ing this man in one ac -- cord— Breathe, call and eat!

lyrics.stanza: Satan's one aim: to ruin man, Man, who's the center of God's plan! But man will rule the earth utterly, Conquering every enemy. Each time we turn and eat this man We put an end to Satan's plan. Jesus through His humanity Has conquered all!
